translation.en: I'm guessing it's the relay or the spark plugs.

-[pants] Right now. Come on. -Dad?

Do not move, no matter what happens.

Let's have it.
All of it.
Let's go in.

Win, you live.
Lose, you die.
[man] Now that's too bad.
Snake eyes. What can I say? House always wins.

-Run! -[grunts]
-Kid's gone. -[man sighs]

Snake Eyes!
They call you "Snake Eyes" and yet you always win.
Of course, your technique is a bit crude, but that has its advantages.

That ain't creepy at all.
[man] When you grow up on the streets, it's them or you, right?
My name is Kenta Takamura, and I could use a man like you.

translation.ko: 미안한데 당신 같은 사람 밑에서 일 안 해

I know. You are a drifter.
You fight until no one will bet against you anymore,

translation.en: -and then move on. -Well, works for me.

I like to know who I'm hiring.
I told you, I ain't interested. You got the wrong guy.

"Homicide victim recovered from cabin fire is still unidentified."
My men found it going through your motel room.
It sounds like the police could never ID the body.
Nor did they ever find the killer.
That, Mr. Snake Eyes, is my offer.
I'm pretty good at finding people. Especially people who kill other people.
translation.ko: 내가 사람을 잘 찾거든 특히 사람 죽인 놈들

translation.en: Come work for me,
and I promise you, I'll find the man who did this.
[Kenta] I'll find a spot for you in my crew.
You can start at the docks.
Here comes Fish Boy.
-Cover up! Cover up! Cover up! -Let me know when you get a new joke.

translation.en: -[in English] Hey. Easy, easy. -Huh? They're just kids.
Throw it over. Yeah.
I'm guessing you were always picked last in the playground, huh?
-[mumbles indistinctly] -Hey! No, no, no! Huh?
Take it easy. Hmm?
He meant no disrespect.
-Right? -Yeah. Sure.
translation.ko: 나쁜 뜻 아니었어, 그렇지? 그럼, 당연하지

translation.en: I don't know what your deal is, but you have guts.
[Snake Eyes] Boss.
Fish Boy.
[grunts] What's goin' on?
Boss wants to talk to you.
Am I in trouble?
Someone is.
Leave the knife. Hmm?
We operate on one currency.
Not money. Not fear. Just one simple thing.
translation.ko: 돈도 두려움도 아닌 단순한 한 가지다

See, 'cause without trust, there can be no loyalty.
And without loyalty…
there is no Yakuza.
[Kenta] Tommy-san.
[in English] You look surprised to see me.
Kenta.
I wouldn't have pictured you in a place like this with friends like these.

-And you are one of its most disgraced. -This man betrayed our trust.
translation.ko: 넌 가문의 수치고 이놈은 우리 신뢰를 저버렸다

Let's show him what loyalty really looks like.
[in English] This is a mistake.
Everything we want in life comes at a price.
-Now do it. -[gun clicks]
-That's disappointing. -[inhales deeply] Kenta!
Mind?
-[truck engine revving] -Come on. Let's get out of here!
Let's go!
Now can we go?
-[Snake Eyes] This way! -[man 1 shouting in Japanese]
-[in English] No, no, no. -[Tommy] Kenta!

[grunts] You always were.
[in English] Tommy, get in the truck!

[policeman] LAPD. Drop your weapons.
-Don't move. -[pants] You all right?
[pants] Yeah. Just peachy.
Good.

You're safe.
We are going home.
I don't have a home.
Not yours. Mine.
I owe you a blood debt.
You saved my life. Why?
I'm not a murderer.
I looked into your eyes, and I saw honor.
So, why run guns for the Yakuza?
translation.ko: 어쩌다 조폭 밑에서 무기 밀매를 한 거야?

translation.en: -It was a mistake. -Well, you got that right.
If Kenta ever sees you again, you are a dead man.
translation.ko: 켄타가 널 다시 보면 죽일 테니까

We grew up together.
We were both next in line to become leader of our clan.
But there can only be one.
So Kenta tried to have me killed.
When his treachery was discovered…
I was given the responsibility to decide his fate.
translation.ko: 내가 켄타의 운명을 결정하게 됐을 때

translation.en: I ordered him banished.
And since then,
he has been trying to seize power the only way he knows how.
translation.ko: 자기가 아는 유일한 방법으로 권력을 되찾으려 애쓰고 있어

translation.en: Through greed and violence.
I didn't know till today it was Kenta smuggling these guns to Japan.
translation.ko: 일본으로 무기 밀수를 하는 게 켄타인 줄 이제야 알았어

translation.en: I was ambushed. You're his enemy now too.
translation.ko: 무방비 상태로 당했지 이제 너도 놈의 적이야

translation.en: Which means your "Fish Boy" life in LA…
is over.
There's no going back.
Hey, where are we heading?
[Snake Eyes] Really?
What is it exactly you do?
A little of this, little of that.
-That your wife? -No.
-Your girlfriend. -Uh-uh.
Sister?
Akiko is our chief of security.
We value her advice, but we don't have to take it.
translation.ko: 아키코 충고는 중요하지만 결정은 우리가 해

Don't forget to bow.
Snake Eyes,
I present the leader of the Clan Arashikage, Sen.
My grandmother.
[Sen] The man who saved my grandson's life.
We Arashikage are in your debt, which means Japan is in your debt.
translation.ko: 우리 집안이 큰 빚을 졌네요 즉 일본 전체가 빚을 진 거죠

translation.en: Don't worry about it.
I'll settle for a hot bath and a plane ticket out of here.
I have a better idea.
Stay.
I want you to join us.
Join the Arashikage.
Sen-sama. If I may.
Even allowing him this much access is reckless.
I vouch for him.
With respect, Tommy-san, you do not lead this clan.
translation.ko: - 이 사람은 내가 보증해 - 죄송하지만 도련님은 수장이 아니에요

translation.en: -Not yet. -Someday I will.
And I will need a warrior like this by my side.
translation.ko: 그땐 이런 전사가 내 곁에 필요해

translation.en: Someone I can trust with my life.
translation.ko: 내 목숨도 맡길 수 있는 사람

translation.en: For 600 years,
our ninja have brought peace and stability to Japan.
The secret blade and iron wall of every government since the age of Edo.
translation.ko: 에도 시대부터 막후에서 정부를 위해 싸웠죠

translation.en: But things have changed.
New threats call for new strategies, even welcoming outsiders.
translation.ko: 새로운 위협엔 새 전략으로 맞서야 합니다 외부인을 들여서라도요

Any questions we have about our new friend…

He will.
I'm sorry, the Three Challenges of the what now?
The Three Challenges are designed to reveal an applicant's character.

translation.en: The first two will cleanse you of ego, anger, and fear,
translation.ko: 첫 두 시험을 통해 자존심, 분노, 두려움을 떨쳐내고

That's the true test.
It will be up to you whether you wish to take it.
What if I fail?
You die.
You're being serious.
I wouldn't put you in that position if I thought it was likely.
translation.ko: 실패할 거 같았으면 하라고도 안 했어

A home.

Come.

Us?
My name…
my name is Tomisaburo Arashikage.

I am this clan.

-I owe him this chance. -I understand it.

"Too quick to anger, too quick to react." Now you sound like Grandmother.

that means 20% pass, Akiko.
Just saying.

our fighters have been trained
by the greatest warriors the world has ever known.
Hard Master.
And most honorable
Blind Master.

how to kill when necessary, but most importantly,

translation.ko: 우리 가문의 사고방식으로 사는 법까지 배운다

Strike with honor.

You are nothing. This challenge is a waste of time.
You will fail.

Let's go.
Challenge one.

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Hard Master] That's one.
[Hard Master] Two.
-[breathes heavily] -[Hard Master] That's three.
[in Japanese] This is embarrassing.

[Tommy, in English] Abandon ego.
Selflessness and truthfulness…
will lead to harmony.
Hard Master.
[breathes heavily] I humbly request that you accept my bowl in exchange for yours.
No congratulations?
-One down, two to go. -Congratulations.

translation.en: If I ever need a bowl of water, I know who to ask.
translation.ko: 이제 물 먹고 싶으면 그쪽한테 부탁할게요

translation.en: You hide it well, but I can tell you're a little impressed with me.

To Tommy, our future toryo.

To Snake Eyes. May you die well.

I need warriors like you,

translation.en: as brothers.

translation.en: Anyway… eat.

He is very nearsighted.

well, he is watching you.

His motorbikes?
-Bike… [speaks Japanese] -[in English] Yes.
That one.
Keep an eye on the bike.
I didn't know if you would show up.
Why?
Just because you left me to bleed out on a dock in LA?
All you had to do was get Tommy on that boat.

Hey, it worked.
You earned his trust. You got in.

"I looked into your eyes and saw honor"?

How you tried to kill him and he cast you out of the clan.
Our family drama is not your concern.
Yeah, you're right about that, 'cause I'm out.

translation.en: And here I had a gift for you.
You found him.
-Where? -Easy now.
I kept my word. Now you have to keep yours.
They want me to take three tests.
I fail the third, I die.
So, whatever you need me to do, it better be quick.
It's up to you.

[chuckles] The Jewel of the Sun.

Find the jewel and bring it to me…

[in English] "You're welcome."
[Snake Eyes] This place is built like a fortress. What are you protecting?
translation.ko: 여긴 꼭 요새 같은데 뭘 지키는 거지?

translation.en: When I was young,
I was told stories of the Sun Goddess.
Once, long ago, she wanted to test the character of her people,
so she sent down a gift in the form of a jewel.
A jewel that contained the power of the sun.
We swore an oath to protect it, but more important,
translation.ko: 우린 그 보석을 지키고 더 중요한 건

translation.en: to never use it ourselves.
translation.ko: 자신을 위해 쓰지 않겠다 맹세했다는 거야

translation.en: -As I grew, I realized why. -[somber music playing]
We have the power to destroy anyone who wrongs us,
translation.ko: 적을 파괴할 수 있는 강력한 무기지만

translation.en: but that is a dangerous temptation.
True power calls for discipline.
This is Morning Light.
My gift to you for passing the first challenge.
translation.ko: 네게 주는 선물이야 첫 번째 시험 통과 축하해

translation.en: It's easy to shoot with a gun,
but the sword is a weapon of honor.
[in English] You know what I mean.
[in English] It suits you.
Hey, there was nothing in that brochure about a nuclear jewel.
translation.ko: 원자력 보석 얘긴 안내 책자에 없던데?

translation.en: Only a few have access.
My grandmother, the masters…
and me.
It seems like a lot of protocol for a fairy tale.
Not protocol. There's a DNA lock.
Like I said, blood matters to my family.
What are you doing here?
[chuckles] You.
I was going for a walk.
Hmm. With a sword?
I thought it was time to get serious about my training.
translation.ko: 진지하게 훈련할 때가 된 것 같아서요

translation.en: That's Morning Light, a weapon of honor.
What makes you think you deserve it? What makes you think you can use it?
translation.ko: 당신이 자격이 될까요? 제대로 쓸 수 있겠어요?

translation.en: How hard could it be?
Let's find out.
-How'd you get that scar? -How did you get your name?
I'll tell you when you get to know me better.
If you live that long.
-How about a wager? -I'm all ears.
Land one blow on me and I won't cut them both off.
translation.ko: 날 한 번이라도 치면 귀 두 쪽 멀쩡히 둘게요

translation.en: And if I lose? [gasps]
-You tell me why you're here. -[breathes heavily] I thought I did.
translation.ko: - 여기 온 이유를 말해요 - 훈련하러 왔다니까요

translation.en: -We're training. -Here with the Arashikage.
You're on.
With your sword.
-Come at me like you mean it. -[grunts]
It's not your skill that's lacking, it's your heart.
If your heart is pure, our secrets will reveal themselves to you.
translation.ko: 마음만 순수하면 우리 비밀은 자연히 알게 돼

translation.en: If not…
…they'll be your end.
-You gonna get that? -[cell phone ringing]
-A win without honor is no win at all. -[sighs]

If I move fast, I can get the jump on him.
-[Akiko] You have a location? -Shinjuku.
-I'll send a team. -No.
I'll handle this myself.
You have that look you get sometimes. The shadow before a storm.
translation.ko: 또 그 표정이시네요 폭풍 전야 같은

translation.en: That storm will pass when I kill Kenta.
Tommy.
I'll come with you.
[Akiko] I'll block the alley from the street.
Tommy, you handle the rest of them.

-What about Kenta? -He's mine.
[Akiko] They're here.
[in Japanese] Who are you?
[in English] Boys.
[in English] Cobra.
This is a lot of firepower.
What does Kenta want with it all?
To start a war. With us.
Which means we're gonna need support. Let's call Scarlett.
-[Tommy] Major O'Hara. -[Scarlett] Give me a second.
I need to take care of some surprise guests.
Go ahead.
Kenta is back in Tokyo and aligning with Cobra.
translation.ko: 켄타가 도쿄에 돌아왔어 코브라와 손을 잡고

translation.en: -This is recent? -From tonight.
Hang on a sec, okay?
Should we be worried?
-About Scarlett? -No, Major O'Hara is with the Joes.
translation.ko: 스칼렛이요? 오하라 소령은 지 아이 조 일원이야

translation.en: -The what? -An elite global counterterrorism unit.
translation.ko: 그게 뭔데? 최정예 국제 대테러 부대

translation.en: They're the good guys.
-[Scarlett] Cobra. -So, what's the deal with Cobra?
The deal is, they're a secret network of terrorist cells, crime syndicates,
translation.ko: 테러범, 조직 범죄단을 비롯해 무기 제조업자와

translation.en: arms manufacturers and paramilitary groups linked under a single centralized command.
translation.ko: 불법 무장 조직으로 결성된 지상 최대의 테러 단체죠

translation.en: A shadow organization devoted to bringing about global revolution
translation.ko: 폭력, 강탈, 공포로 세계 질서를 어지럽히는

translation.en: through violence, extortion, and fear.
-[tense music playing] -[indistinct chatter over PA]
[Tommy] Major?
Major O'Hara? Major?
[Scarlett] I just sent you a mission brief.
I've been keeping tabs on an old friend of mine
who just landed in Japan. I don't think it's a coincidence.
translation.ko: 감시하던 친구가 막 일본에 도착했는데 우연이 아닌 거 같네

translation.en: Her name's Ana DeCobray, aka "Baroness."
Since we lost touch, she's been busy.
She killed a member of parliament?
[Scarlett] Along with 200 other passengers on the same train,
just to influence an election.
She's been linked to bombings, assassinations,
translation.ko: 수많은 나라에서 일어난 폭탄 테러, 암살

translation.en: and civil unrest everywhere from Nanzhao to Barovia.
translation.ko: 수많은 나라에서 일어난 폭탄 테러, 암살 시민 폭동의 배후 인물이야

translation.en: In short, she's top-echelon Cobra.
If Kenta's linked up with the Baroness, the threat to you is significant.
I'll be in Tokyo as soon as I can.
I didn't sign up to work for terrorists.
translation.ko: 테러범을 위해 일하겠다고 한 적 없는데

translation.en: A little late to grow a conscience, don't you think?
translation.ko: 양심을 따지기엔 좀 늦은 거 아닌가?

translation.en: We each have our own agenda.
There is no reason this triangle of ours can't be purely transactional.
translation.ko: 우리 셋 사이에서는 필요한 것만 주고받자고

translation.en: We all have something the other wants.
Baroness.
I know who you are and what you've done.
That rock you want me to steal, it's for Cobra, isn't it?
translation.ko: 그 보석, 코브라 때문에 훔치라고 한 거지?

translation.en: No. I didn't sign up for this.
translation.ko: 안 해 이런 일인 줄 몰랐어

translation.en: As I said, ours is a series of exchanges.
Kenta wants to destroy the clan.
The clan has something I want.
And we have something you want. Now of course,
translation.ko: 우리한텐 네가 원하는 게 있지 물론 생각이 바뀐 거면

translation.en: if you've had a change of heart, you are free to go.
translation.ko: 물론 생각이 바뀐 거면 가도 좋아

translation.en: But then, so is he.
He goes by Augustine.
The man who took your father's life,
and yours.
Tell me where he is.
Under lock and key.
But I promise you, back out now and you will never see him again.
translation.ko: 하지만 장담컨대 지금 그만두면 놈을 다시는 못 만날 거다

translation.en: All that rage…
for all these years.
Are you sure you're ready to give up the hunt
when you're so close to finding peace?
Think about it.
You have three days.
Then I let him go.
Trust me. He'll do it.
He'd better. Or I kill you both.
translation.ko: 그래야지 아니면 너희 둘 다 죽일 거야

translation.en: [Blind Master] Every warrior has a weakness your enemy can exploit.
translation.ko: 모든 전사에겐 적이 악용할 약점이 있고

translation.en: The second challenge will expose it.
translation.ko: 두 번째 시험에서 그게 노출될 거다

translation.en: To avoid harm, you must first learn how you harm yourself.
translation.ko: 자신을 지키려면 약점이 뭔지부터 알아야 한다

translation.en: Most can't manage and fail.
Where is everybody else?
This test is private and unique to you.
You face it alone.
The light will reveal all.
Follow it.
I'm sorry, Dad.
I couldn't stop him.
It's not your fault. You were just a kid.
I couldn't save you.
[father] You saved yourself.
That's the only thing that mattered to me.
Did I pass?
This is more than a test you pass or fail. It is a mirror to reveal your weakness.
translation.ko: 이 시험엔 통과나 실패가 없다 네 약점을 드러내는 거울 같은 거지

translation.en: -[sighs] -[Blind Master] Even if it causes you more pain, you must unburden yourself.
translation.ko: 더 큰 고통이 따르더라도 너 자신을 내려놔야 해

translation.en: It is the only way to overcome the third challenge.
translation.ko: 그래야만 세 번째 시험을 통과할 수 있다

translation.en: And I assure you, this is not a challenge you want to fail.
translation.ko: 그 시험에선 절대 실패하면 안 되니까

translation.en: [man, in Japanese] Motion detectors picked up activity in our weapons research facility.
-[Akiko] Did you make an ID? -He was masked.
How did they get past the walls?
Maybe they didn't.
[in English] Did I miss something?
I followed you into the city.
But you know that. Where did you go?
[scoffs] You've been looking for a reason not to trust me from the start.
You're an unknown. That's dangerous.
-I think you can handle yourself. -Dangerous to this clan.
translation.ko: - 나 정도는 쉽게 제압하실 텐데 - 이 조직에 위험하다고

translation.en: You don't know what this place means to me.
translation.ko: 여기가 내게 어떤 의미인지 넌 몰라

translation.en: I owe the Arashikage everything.
I never knew family before I arrived here.
translation.ko: 여기 오기 전엔 가족이 뭔지도 몰랐지

translation.en: Can you understand that?
You wanna know why I've been a ghost for so long?
translation.ko: 내가 왜 유령으로 오랫동안 살았는지 알아?

translation.en: My father was murdered when I was a kid.
When I tried to find out why, it was as if he didn't exist.
translation.ko: 이유를 알고 싶었지만 아버지는 존재하지도 않는 사람이었지

translation.en: False identities, false papers.
Everything about him was a lie.
Even my own name.
That's why I couldn't find you.
If I pass the third challenge…
I'm Arashikage, right?
If you pass.
I have to pass.
I've done unforgivable things I wish I could tell you, but I can't.
translation.ko: 용서받지 못할 짓을 저질렀지만 지금은 말 못 해

translation.en: But if I could become part of this family, be its protector…
translation.ko: 하지만 가문의 일원이 되어 여기를 지킬 수 있다면

translation.en: I think that would make it right.
Then empty your heart.
Whatever you're hiding in there, the challenge will see right through it.
translation.ko: 숨기는 게 뭐든 시험은 꿰뚫어 볼 테니

translation.en: [Blind Master] I see that you have a clouded mind.
You live on both sides of the mirror.
Only you know whether you are ready to take this test.
Be certain that you wish to proceed.
Once the third challenge begins, there is no turning back.
translation.ko: 세 번째 시험은 일단 시작하면 되돌릴 수 없어

translation.en: I'm sure.
Those who pass are accepted into the Arashikage.
If you survive,
you will gain access to our knowledge and our power.
translation.ko: 가문의 지식과 힘도 얻을 수 있다

translation.en: But…
you must swear loyalty to our clan. Do you accept this condition?
translation.ko: 하지만 먼저 충성을 맹세해야 해 받아들이겠나?

translation.en: I do.
What do I do when I get down there?
[Blind Master] There is a particular tile.
-Step on it and wait for judgment. -[chuckles]
-Something funny? -You will see…
Snake.
Giant anacondas, as old as time.
They never harm those who are pure of heart.
translation.ko: 마음이 순수한 자는 절대 해치지 않아

translation.en: What about everybody else?
Empty your heart.
Go!
Go!
She knows our rules. She will be punished.
translation.ko: 아키코도 규정을 다 알았어 벌을 받을 거다

translation.en: -Grandmother-- -[Sen] You brought him among us.
The fault is not hers alone.
No, Sen-san.
The fault is mine.
Explain yourself.
The penalty of lying is death.
We are all listening.
My heart is not pure.
I seek vengeance.
My father was murdered.
I have dedicated my life to finding the man who did it…
and killing him.
This is all I've ever wanted.
He speaks the truth.
Your honesty wins you your life,
but not among the Arashikage.
Snake!
You should have told me.
We could have been brothers.
I know I failed you.
You are the only brother I've ever known.
And I would pay you back with my life if I had to.
Keep it.
[Tommy] It's safe.
[in English] I was hoping you wouldn't do that.
Akiko.
You still wanna know how I got my scar?
translation.ko: 내 상처에 대해 아직도 알고 싶어?

translation.en: From the last man I trusted.
Trust is a hard thing to come by these days.
translation.ko: 요즘 같은 세상에 아무나 믿으면 안 되지

translation.en: Time for you to learn a lesson.
You have placed the clan at risk.
translation.ko: 너 때문에 가문 전체가 위험에 처했다

translation.en: You must atone.
We will return the Jewel…
and bring you the head of Snake Eyes.
[Baroness] So?
Do you have it?
You're gonna start a war with the Arashikage, aren't you?
What do you care?
Remember our deal, and you will get what I promised you.
translation.ko: 우리 거래만 기억해 약속한 건 줄 테니

translation.en: This isn't my fight.
Come here.
Please, enjoy your reward.
You will get the Jewel once I've destroyed the clan.
Who are you?
You killed my dad.
You're going to have to be a little more specific.
I killed a lot of people.
Roll.
Win, you live.
Lose, you die.
Roll!
Roll!
Snake Eyes.
Okay, okay. All right.
Now I remember you. You attacked me, tried to save your dad.
translation.ko: 이제 기억나 아빠 살리겠다고 내게 덤볐지

translation.en: [Snake Eyes] Why did you kill him?
Cobra gives an order, you don't question it.
-You're Cobra. -[scoffs]
I was.
Until three weeks ago, when that bitch dragged me off a chopper at gunpoint.
translation.ko: 3주 전 그 여자가 총을 겨누고 헬리콥터에서 끌어내기 전까진

translation.en: You must be a big man for the Baroness to hand me over.
translation.ko: 배로니스가 날 넘기는 걸 보니 꽤나 거물인가 봐

translation.en: Let's go. Let's do this.
[Snake Eyes] I have to stop Kenta.
[Akiko] There he is.
[Tommy] Follow him.
[Tommy] What's he doing?
[Akiko] Looks like he's heading back to the castle.
[Tommy] Let's go.
[man, in Japanese] I need backup!
[Akiko, in English] Did you see that? Snake's fighting on our side.
[Snake Eyes, over radio] Tommy, listen to me.
Kenta's got the Jewel and is headed for the castle.
translation.ko: 켄타가 보석을 갖고 성으로 가고 있어

translation.en: Can you hear me? Tommy! Akiko!
Shit!
We have to keep you safe.
Nothing matters but the safety of the clan.
-You are the clan! -I am nothing by myself.
translation.ko: 어르신이 곧 가문입니다! 나 혼자선 아무것도 아니야

translation.en: I guess the party started early.
-He needs help. -[Tommy] He deserves to die.
[Snake Eyes] We have to stop Kenta. He has the Jewel.
translation.ko: 켄타를 막아야 해 보석을 갖고 있어

translation.en: [grunts] This isn't over.
-[grunts] -Leave! Now!
I am the Arashikage.
-This is a terrible idea. [grunts] -[engine revving]
[in Japanese] You have fought bravely.
I give you my word, your end will be swift and painless.
[in English] Very noble. But the promise is not yours to make.
The Jewel. The clan is destroyed.
We kept our side of the bargain. I trust you'll keep yours.
With this jewel, Cobra will be invincible.
-[Kenta] Maybe I'll just keep it. -[Baroness groaning]
No good deed, huh?
Shut up.
Cobra will annihilate you.
[Tommy] You protect my grandmother. I'll go after the Jewel.
[Kenta] When you cast me out, I warned you
translation.ko: 날 쫓아낼 때 내가 경고했지 이런 날이 올 거라고

translation.en: this day would come.
translation.ko: 내가 경고했지 이런 날이 올 거라고

translation.en: Kneel.
Very well, then.
Die.
We're under attack! It's Tommy.
Snake.
-You're in a tight spot, huh? -I've been in worse.
translation.ko: - 좀 곤란하게 됐네? - 더 힘든 일도 겪었어

translation.en: Still, I'd like to propose a very temporary alliance.
All right. But when it's over, I walk.
Not a chance, but I'll give you a head start.
translation.ko: 그건 안 되지만 먼저 가게는 해줄게

translation.en: You're losing your touch. I saw you a mile away.
Sure you did.
Good of you to join us, Tommy-san. And just in time.
I count 20 men.
-Heavy odds. -Yeah. For them.
Snake Eyes, betray our trust again, I'll kill you myself.
translation.ko: 스네이크 아이즈 한 번 더 배신하면 내 손으로 죽여주마

translation.en: [Snake Eyes] What is she doing here?
Let's just say our goals are temporarily aligned.
[Baroness] Just for tonight.
They're mine.
Yo, Joe.
Oh, fuck this.
You should have killed me when you had the chance.
-[Sen] Tommy! -[breathes heavily]
Tommy-san, no! Tommy-san!
[Akiko] Kenta's gone.
[breathes heavily] Where's Snake?
-[groans] -[Kenta] Just stay down.
[groans, pants] Abandon ego.
[groans, pants] Practice selflessness.
Strike with honor.
This is where you die.
The Jewel of the Sun is secure.
And it always will be.
At least for another generation.
I will be the last of our family to lead the Arashikage.
translation.ko: 우리 혈통이 수장이 되는 건 나에서 끝이다

translation.en: [Akiko] But Sen-sama…
I had no choice.
I only used the Jewel to defend our people.
There is always a choice.
Our clan swore an oath to never use the Jewel,
only to protect it.
You can never…
lead the clan.
-With respect-- -Remember your vows,
Tommy, to forever serve the clan in any capacity.
"Serve"?
[yells] Serve?
I have given my life to this clan!
-I have sacrificed everything! -Tommy.
It is my blood right!
You offered me your life.
Next time we meet… [pants]
…I will take it.
[gasps] Tomisaburo, wait.
You will always be a part of this family.
I serve no one.
-I'm going after Tommy. -I had a feeling you might.
translation.ko: - 토미를 찾을 거야 - 그럴 줄 알았어

translation.en: Are you sure that's wise? In his state, who knows what he might do.
translation.ko: 현명한 일일까? 지금 상태면 무슨 짓을 저지를지 몰라

translation.en: That's why I have to find him.
This is all my fault.
I have to do everything I can to make it right.
Well, this might be useful.
[Akiko] Be careful.
[clears throat] Excuse me.
My commander, General Joe Colton, wanted to share this with you.
translation.ko: 내 상관인 콜턴 장군님이 이걸 보여주래

translation.en: [Snake Eyes] I don't understand.
Your father was one of us. A Joe.
He was a Joe?
You'll find no record of you in there. He kept you off the grid to protect you.
translation.ko: 당신에 대한 기록은 없어 당신을 보호하려고 존재 자체를 숨기셨어

translation.en: So, why was he killed?
Your father infiltrated a Cobra cell. But they found out.
By the time we got there, he was dead and you were gone.
translation.ko: 우리가 갔을 땐 이미 돌아가셨고 당신도 없었지

translation.en: But you should know the intel he provided saved thousands of lives.
translation.ko: 당신 아버지 정보 덕에 수천 명이 목숨을 구했어

translation.en: At the cost of his own.
[Scarlett] It was a price he was willing to pay
to make the world a safer place for the rest of us.
translation.ko: 더 안전한 세상을 만들고자 희생하신 거지

translation.en: Safer for his son.
He left some big shoes to fill, your dad.
It hasn't been easy finding the right person to fill them.
[chuckles softly] So, you're saying I could be a Joe?
translation.ko: 나도 지 아이 조가 될 수 있다고?

translation.en: Anything's possible.
We all make mistakes.
It's what we do next that really matters.
When you're ready, Akiko knows where to find us.
There's something I need to do first.
Let's find Tommy and bring him home.
[Baroness] Something to drink before takeoff?
I'm not here to kill you.
I came to make you an offer.
You've lost an army, Tommy.
But I can get you a better one.
translation.ko: 더 나은 군대를 줄 수 있는데

translation.en: Storm Shadow.
Call me Storm Shadow.
